verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: as israel targets iran in syria] [ARG0: u s officials] [V: warn] [ARG1: of reprisals israel is conducting a military campaign across syria against iran - backed militia groups an effort that has been encouraged by the white house but aroused the concern of many u s military officials white house israel iran hezbollah official united states nicholas heras syria iraq pentagon u s president trump]

as israel targets iran in syria u s officials warn of reprisals israel [V: is] conducting a military campaign across syria against iran - backed militia groups an effort that has been encouraged by the white house but aroused the concern of many u s military officials white house israel iran hezbollah official united states nicholas heras syria iraq pentagon u s president trump
